channel.title: CVE Feed for 5280studios -- 5280 Bootstrap Modal Contact Form
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 5280studios -- 5280 Bootstrap Modal Contact Form

item.title: CVE-2024-0847|2024-05-02T16:51:50.133Z -- 5280studios -- 5280%20bootstrap%20modal%20contact%20form
item.description: The 5280 Bootstrap Modal Contact Form plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.0. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation in class-sbmm-list-table.php. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bulk delete messages via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
